alert.note: Alert for Cass; Morgan; Scott (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Central Illinois (Central and East Central Illinois)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued April 05 at 5:55AM CDT until April 05 at 11:00AM CDT by NWS Central Illinois
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 615 AM CDT FOR EASTERN SCOTT...SOUTH CENTRAL CASS AND MORGAN COUNTIES... At 554 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over mainly rural areas of Morgan County, moving northeast at 60 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of eastern Scott, south central Cass and Morgan Counties, including the following locations... Nortonville, Riggston, Merritt, Lynnville, South Jacksonville, Jacksonville Municipal Airport, Concord and Lake Jacksonville. This includes Interstate 72 between mile markers 51 and 73. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
